game.name: Darkwood
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Darkwood - a new perspective on survival horror. Scavenge and explore a rich, ever-changing free-roam world by day, then hunker down in your hideout and pray for the morning light.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Darkwood - a new perspective on survival horror. Scavenge and explore a rich, ever-changing free-roam world by day, then hunker down in your hideout and pray for the morning light.

reviewHighlights.text: 2번의 구매 5번의 플레이 3번의 엔딩 내 생에 최고의 공포 게임
